alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pierce County through 615 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Pierce, or 13 miles north of Norfolk, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
